typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SpeakersSource
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		Code as string,
		Name as string,
		TagLine as string,
		ProfilePicture as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SpeakersDestination
SpeakersSource, SpeakersDestination exists(SpeakersSource@Id == Code,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SpeakerExist
